actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Magnuson-Moss Warranty-Federal Trade Commission Improvement Act to extend the filing date of a study of rulemaking procedures under section 18 of the Federal Trade Commission Act.

summary.text: Amends the Magnuson-Moss Warranty-Federal Trade Commission Improvement Act to extend the filing date of a study of specified rulemaking procedures of the Federal Trade Commission. until June 30, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Magnuson-Moss Warranty-Federal Trade Commission Improvement Act to extend the filing date of a study of rulemaking procedures under section 18 of the Federal Trade Commission Act.
